attributes.additional_details:
Residential areas should be free from nuisance noise before 9:00 am on every day of the week.
My area has gradually become louder because builders can start to work machinery at 8:00 am. Do you want leaf blowers, tree surgery, building works, scaffold constructions, sirens, service and work vehicles all contributing to wake you up or damaging the environment for you and others around you?
There has to be common sense and respect for others, this has been eroded recently.
